DOC.brief_summary: Comparing the analgesic effects of ketamine and dexmedetomidine when added to local anesthetic in TAP block for postoperative analgesia after lower abdominal cancer surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Ketamine Versus Dexmedetomidine With Local Anesthetic in TAP Block
DOC.criteria: All patients ASA I and II to whom abdominal surgery for cancer will be conducted will be included in the study Coagulopathies ASA III or IV, patient refusal, sensitivity to the used drugs
